/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a vibrant tableau of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
